{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AX6000 802.11ax WiFi Router |caption2 = NEC Aterm BL1000HW - 802.11ax WiFi Router |pp = http://www.aterm.jp/kddi/1000hw/ |sp = https://www.au.com/support/service/internet/guide/lan/bl1000/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = NEC |model = BL1000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = HW |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX60002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8072; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- 2.0 GHz 2.2 GHz 1.4 GHz (+ NPU @1.7GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Aquantia;AQR107; |eth3chip = Aquantia;AQR107; |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 10GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MU-MIMO, 256QAM, VHT80, Z-Wave, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/08/2018 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad1ax = 4804 |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5024; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad2ax = 1148 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[NEC BL1000HW]] - ''AX6000 WiFi Router'' • [https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2018/03/05/qualcomm-kddi-and-nec-platforms-ship-worlds-first-commercially-available PR] • [https://internet.watch.impress.co.jp/docs/news/1105571.html KDDI ISP] :'''CPU:''' [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072 @2.0GHz Quad Core Processor :'''WLAN:''' [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072 (4T4R 2.4GHz + 4T4R 5GHz) :802.11ax: HE80/HE40/HE20, 802.11ac: VHT80/VHT40/VHT20 <!-- :OFDMA [HE20] 242Mbps、[HE40] 484Mbps、[HE80] 996Mbps :※1 - 2.4GHz: 1147.1Mbps（HE40), 5GHz: 2401.9Mbps（HE80） :※2 - 5.2GHz (W52), 5.3GHz (W53), 5.6GHz (W56) :802.11n: 2.4GHz OFDM 800Mbps (QAM256), 600Mbps (4T4R) ::[VHT20] 56Mbps, [VHT40] 114Mbps, [VHT80] 242Mbps :※1 - 802.11ac: 5GHz OFDM 1733Mbps（VHT80) MIMO --> :'''WAN:''' 1x 10GbE; '''LAN:''' 1x 10GbE + 3x 1GbE; '''USB:''' 2x USB 3.0 <!-- [http://www.aterm.jp/kddi/1000hw/spec.html Spec.] *WAN: 1x RJ-45 (10GBASE-T/5GBASE-T/2.5GBASE-T/1000BASE-T/100BASE-TX) *LAN1÷3: 3x RJ-45 (1000 BASE-T/100 BASE-TX/10 BASE-TX) *LAN4: 1x RJ-45 (10GBASE-T/5GBASE-T/2.5GBASE-T/1000BASE-T/100BASE-TX) :10Gbps/5Gbps/2.5Gbps/1Gbps/100Mbps --> :'''Z-Wave:''' 920MHz (922.5/923.9/926.3MHz) - 100kbps :'''VoIP Ports:''' 1× RJ-11 (600Ω) PB/DP -48V :'''Power Supply:''' AC Input : 110V ~ (50/60Hz) :DC Output : 12V with max. 3A current (34W) :'''Dimensions:''' 34mm (W) × 219mm (H) × 205mm (D) :'''Weight:''' 1.0kg
==Links of Interest== [https://www.nikkei.com/article/DGXMZO26837970T10C18A2000000/ PR] {{•}} [http://www.aterm.jp/kddi/1000hw/spec.html Spec.]
